Jingwarirenyi kuti musazorashikihwa ngo zvo takashanda, asi kuti muashire musharo wakaperera.
Mundhu wese unopinda vamweni asikagari muzvijijiso zva Kristu, aana Mwari. Uwo unogara muzvijijiso unavo vese, Baba no Mwana.
Kudari aripo mundhu echiviya kwomuri, asikazisi uku kujijisa, musazomuashira mu nyumba jenyu, zve, musazomuchungamija.
Ngokuti uwo unomuchungamija unofambisana no mishando yake yakashata.
Pikija ndinozvizhinji zvo kutara kwomuri andidi kuzvitara paphepa ngoinki, asi ndino gonda kuti ndichaviya kwomuri, no kuvereketa techipingurana ngo muromo, kuti kudakara kwedu kuzarisike.
Vana vo hanzvaji yako yakatsananguhwa vanokutambisa.
Musharuka kuna Gaiyo unodikana wo ndinoda ngo gwinyiso.
Unodikana, ndinokukumbira kuti ngo zviro zvese ubudirire ugwinye, kudari ngo zvo unobudirira mweya wako.
Ngokuti ndakadakara kukurutu, apo hama jakaviya jechipupura ngo gwinyiso rako, kudari ngo zvo unofamba mugwinyiso.
Andina kudakara kunopinda kukura kuno uku, kuzwa ngo kufamba kwo vana vangu mugwinyiso.
Unodikana unoyita mushando unogondeka, ngo izvo zvo unoitira hama no vapfumba;
avo vakapupura ngo rudo rwako pamberi po chiara: Uchanasa kuti wechivaperekeja mumuhambo wavo ngo njira inosisira Mwari;
ngokuti ngo ndava yo iro zina, vakabuda kuenda, vasikatori chiro kubva kuno vo majinja.
Ndizvo tinosisira kuashira vakadaro, kuti tiite vashandi pamwepo navo mugwinyiso.
Ndakatarira zvakatikuti kuchiara, asi Dhiotrafesi, uwo unoda kuyita mukuru pakati pavo, aatiashiri.

Ndizvo, kudari ndechiviyeyo, ndinocherecheja mishando yake yaanoita, echitireva ngo mazwi akashata; asikakwaniswi ngo ukwo, zve, iye pachake aashiri hama, naavo vanoda kuvaashira, unovarambija, no kuvambirimbija muchiara.
Vanodikana, musaejerera icho chakashata, asi icho chakanaka. Iye unoyita zvakanaka ngo wa Mwari; asi uwo unoyita zvakashata aazivi kumuvona Mwari.
Dhemetriyo unopupurihwa ngo vandhu vese, na ngo gwinyiso pacharo naro; eya, nesu tinopupuravo, newe unoziva kuti uchapupu hwedu huno gwinyiso.
Ndina zvizhinji zvo kutara, asi andidi kuti ndizvitare kwomuri ngeinki no peni:
Asi ndinogonda kuti ndinokasira kukuvona, nesu tinozovereketa kupingurana ngo muromo.
Kunyarara ngakuve kwouri. Shamwari jedu jinokutambisa. Chungamija shamwari imwe ngaimwe ngo zina rayo.
Judha, muranda wa Jesu Kristu, no hama ya Jakobe, kwavari vakadanijwa, vanodikana kuna Mwari Baba, vanongwaririhwa Jesu Kristu.
Kukungurihwa, no kunyarara no rudo ngazviwanjwe kwomuri.
Vanodikana, apo ndechidisisa zvikuru kutara kwomuri ngo ruponeso ruri kwetiri tese, ndakavangirijwa kutara kwomuri, ndechimupota kuti murwire kakurutu kutenda kwakapuwa kamwe kuna vakacheneswa.

Ngokuti varipo vandhu vakatikuti, vakanghwina ngo kufishika, ndivo vakaemesehwa kare kuti vavone uku kurashwa, vari vandhu vasikadi Mwari, vechiphinduja nyasha ja Mwari wedu kuyita kuemura, vechiramba uwo ari mutungamiriri ega, na Mambo wedu Jesu Kristu.
Zvino ndinoda kumurangarijisa, pikija munondozviziva zvese izvi, ngonjira yo vakauraya ndiyo Mambo avo vandhu vasikazivi kutenda, sure kwo kuvaponesa kubva ku nyika yo Egipite.

No ngirosi ijo jisikazivi kugara mundau yajo yo kutonga, asi jakasiya ugaro hwajo hwaijisisira, iye wakajingwarira jakasungwa ngo magaragajero asikaperi pasi po chidima mbhera rigume zuva guru rokutongwa.

Kudari ngo Sodhoma no Gomora, no madhoropa aiyatendeneja, ao achijipira mukuomba, kwakadari ngaao, echienda mukuita zvakashata no nyama imweni, anoemeswa kuyita chivonero, achitambujika ngo kurohwa ngo muriro usikajimi.
Ngokudaro vandhu ava mukurota hope javo, vanosvipisa muviri yavo no kuramba majimambo, no kushora uthende wo kudenga.
Asi Mikaeri, ngirosi huru apo yairwa na Dhiabhorosi, yechikanija ngo ndava yo muviri wa Mosi, isikazivi kuchunga kumuitira kutukwa kwo kutonga, asi yakati: “Mambo ngaakukamise!”
Asi ava vandhu vanotuka ngo izvo zvo vasikazivi no zvo vanoziva ngo chibarihwe chavo, navo vanoshaishihwa ngo izvo zvo vasikazwisisi kudari ngo nyama jisina mupinimijo.
Khombo kwavari! Ngokuti vakafamba ngo njira ya Kheni, vakajirasa mukupauka kwa Barami kuti vawane kuviihwa, vakafa mukati mwo hasha ja Kora.

Ava ndio mapuwe vakafishika mukuha kwenyu kwo rudo, apo vechiha nemwi, vahavisi vanojigutisa vachikatyi; makore asina kumwa, anotutwa ngo bepo, vari miti yo chipepo isina muchero, yakafa kaviri, yakabvitwa no miji;
vari mavimbi ojombe akanyangajwa, echibudisa mafuro okupsheruka kwao, ndhondo jinopepesheka, vakangwaririhwa kusvipa kwo chidima mbhera narini.
Enoki wo chinomwe kubva kuna Adhamu wakaprofeta ndivo, echiti: “Vonanyi, Mambo wakaviya no vakacheneswa vake vakawandisisa”,
kuti atonge vese, no kunyisa vese vasikadiri Mwari ngo mushando yavo yese yo vakayita ngo kutama kudira Mwari, no kunyisa zvese zvinorema zvakavereketwa ngo vashaishi vasikadiri Mwari.
Ava vari van'un'uti no vasikatendi vachifamba kudari ngo kuemura kwavo, no miromo yavo inovereketa mazwi makuru okujikuja, vechisana vandhu kuti vawane kupfumiswa.
Asi imwimwi, vanodikana, rangariranyi mazwi akavereketwa ngo vapostori va Mambo wedu Jesu Kristu.
Vakati kwomuri kuti: “Ngo mukuvo wo kugumisira kunozovepo vaiti vo jee, vechifamba kudari ngo kuemura kwavo kwo kusikadiri Mwari.”
Ava ndivo vanoparajana no vamweni, vari vo nyama vasina Mweya.
Asi imwimwi, vanodikana, mwechijivaka panyezuru po kugonda kwenyu kwakachenesesa, mwechikumbira mu Mweya Wakachena,
jingwarirenyi murudo rwa Mwari, mwechirindira kukungurira kwa Mambo wedu Jesu Kristu, muwane kupona kusikaperi.
Muitire nyasha vamweni vari mukugononda;
no vamweni mwechivaponesa, mwechivabvuka kubva mumuriro; no vamweni muchivaitira nyasha ngo kutya, mwechinyenya no zvo kufuka zvakasvipiswa zvina mavara onyama.
Zvino kwaari unosimba rokumungwarira kubva mukupsherujwa, no kumuemesa pamberi po uthende hwake musina ndava, ngo kudakara kwakakura,
kuna Mwari ari ega Muponesi wedu, ndiye Jesu Kristu Mambo wedu, ngakuve no uthende, no umambo, no kutonga no simba, nguva isati yaavepo, nazvino, no mbhera narini. Ameni.
Chakapangijihwa cha Jesu Kristu, chaakapuwa ndi Mwari, kuti apangijire kuvaranda vake izvo zvinosisira kuitika ngo kukasira, naye wakatuma, akazvipangijira ngo ngirosi yake kumuranda wake Johani,
uwu wakapupurira izwi ra Mwari no uchapupu hwa Jesu Kristu, hwo zvese zvaakavona.
Unomuchena uwo unojija, naavo vanozwa mazwi okuprofeta uku, no kungwarira zvakatahwa mukati mwao; ngokuti nguva yaaphedo.
Johani kuzviara zvinomwe zviri mu Aziya: Nyasha ngajive kwomuri no kunyarara, zvinobva kuna uwo uripo, wayivapo, no unoviya; nokubva kumweya minomwe iri pamberi po dendemaro rake;
nokubva kuna Jesu Kristu uri chapupu chakagondeka, ari dangwe ro kumuka kwo vakafa, no mutongi wo majimambo onyika. Kwaari wakatida, akatisunungura kuzvishaishi zvedu ngo ngazi yake,
akatiita vo umambo, no vapristi kuna Mwari Baba wake, kwaari ngakuve no uthende no kutonga mbhera narini. Ameni.
Vonanyi unoviya no makore, no majiso ese anozomuvona, naavozve vakamubaya no majinja ese onyika anozochumba ngo ndava yake. Eya, Ameni.
Ndiri Arifa na Omega, unonanga Jehovha Mwari, kudaro, Unosimbarese, pakutanga, zvino, no kunguva inoviya.
Inini Johani, hama yenyu no shamwari yenyu mukutambujika no mu umambo, no kusengerera kuna Jesu, ndiri pa chirundu chinozwi Patimosi, ngo ndava yo izwi ra Mwari, no yo uchapupu hwa Jesu.
Ndayinga ndiri mu Mweya ngo zuva ra Mambo, ndakazwa sure kwangu izwi guru rinonga kurira kwo mbhayapaya,
rechiti: “Icho chounovona, tara mutshamba, uitumire muzviara zvinomwe: Ku Efesu, ku Semerina, ku Perigamu, ku Tiyatira, ku Saridesi, ku Firadhefiya, no ku Raodhikiya.”
Neni ndakakunukuka kuti ndivone izwi rakavereketwa kwendiri. Naapo ndakunukuka, ndakavona zvigajikiro zvo zvibani zvinomwe zvo mukore;
no pakati po zvigajikiro zvo zvibani ndakavona umwe wakadari ngo Mwana wo Mundhu, akasimira chokufuka chakaguma kutshoka, no diti rake rakasungwa ngo bhande ro mukore.
No musoro wake no bvuji rake zvakachena kudari ngo mabviri obvuta, zvakachena kudari ngo chando, no majiso ake akadari ngo murazvu wo muriro.
No tshoka jake jakadari ngo thusi rinon'anikira, apo rapiswa muchoto; no izwi rake raidari ngo chaungu cho kumwa yakawanda.
No munyara yake yo kumuho wayinga akabata ndhondo nomwe, no shoti inopinja ino upanga huviri yakabuda kumuromo wake, no hope yake yain'anikira kudari ngo zuva rinojeka ngo simba raro.
Naapo ndamuvona, ndakawa pa tshoka jake inga uwo wafa. Naye wakadira nyara yake yo kumuho panyezuru pangu, echiti: “Usatya; ndiri Muambi no Mugumisiri,
ndiri iye unopona, inga ndafa vonayi ndinopona mbhera narini, neni ndino zvavhi zvo kufa no wo Haidhesi.
Ndizvo tara zviro zvo wavona, no zviripo, no zvinozoitika sure kwa izvi,

no chakafishika cho ndhondo nomwe jowavona munyara yangu yo kumuho, no zvigajikiro zvo zvibani zvinomwe zvo mukore. Ndhondo nomwe, ingirosi jo zviara zvinomwe, no zvigajikiro zvo zvibani zvinomwe zviri zviara zvinomwe.”
“Tarira ku ngirosi yo chiara chiri mu Efesu, wechiti: Unonanga izvi uwo wakabata ndhondo nomwe munyara yake yo kumuho, unofamba pakati po zvigajikiro zvo zvibani zvinomwe zvo mukore:
Ndinoziva mishando yako no kutambujika kwako, no kusengerera kwako nokuti autenderi vandhu vakashata, newe wakavaeja vanojidanija kuti vapostori, asi andivopi, wakavavona kuti vanyepi.
Newe unosengerera wechitsamwirira ngo ndava yo zina rangu, auzivi kuremba.
Asi ndinokushora ngo ichi kuti wakasiya rudo rwako rwo kutanga.
Ndizvo cherecheja apo powakawa, utenderuke, uite mishando yokutanga kuti usikaiti kudaro, ndinozoviya kwouri ndibvise chigajikiro cho chibani chako pandau pacho, kuti usikatenderuki.
Asi ichi unacho, chokuti unonyenya mishando ya vaNikorao, yondinonyenyavo.
Iye uno njeve ngaazwe chinovereketwa ndi Mweya kuzviara. Kwaari unonyisa ndinozomutendera kuti ahe kumuti wo kupona uri mu Paradhasi ra Mwari.”
“Tarira kungirosi yo chiara chiri mu Semerina wechiti: Unonanga izvi uwo wo kutanga no wo kugumisira, wayiva wakafa, nazvino unopona.
Ndinoziva dambujiko rako no urombo hwako, asi uri guruja, zve, ndinoziva kutuka kwavo vanoti vari vajudha, asi andivopi, asi vari vo nyumba yo kudira ya Sathani.

Usatya izvo zvo unozotambujika ndizvo, vonai, Dhiabhorosi woda kunghwinisa vamweni venyu muguniya, kuti muejwe; nemwi munozova no dambujiko mazuva ari gumi. Ita unogondeka mbhera mukufa, neni ndinozokupa junguja ro kupona.
Iye uno njeve ngaazwe zvinovereketwa ngo Mweya kuzviara. Iye unonyisa aazoremajwi ngo kufa kwo chipiri.”
Tarira ngirosi iri muchiara cho Perigamu: Unonanga izvi uno shoti inopinja ino upanga huviri.

Ndinoziva pounogara, ndipo pano dendemaro ra Sathani; newe unobatisisa zina rangu, ausati waramba kutenda kwangu, eya, nokuti kumazuva a Antipasi chapupu changu chakagondeka, wakaurawa pakati penyu, ndipo paanogara Sathani.

Asi ndinokushora ngo zviro zvishomani, ngokuti unavo vamweni vanobata zvijijiso zva Bharami, uwo wakajijisa Bharaki kudira chikhugunyiso pamberi po vana vaIsraeri, nokuha zvinobaihwa muezaniso yo kudira no kuomba.
Ngokudarozve unavo vamweni vanobatisisa zvijijiso zvo vaNikorao,
ndizvo tenderuka, usikaiti kudaro ndinozoviya kwouri ngo kukasira, ndiambane navo ngo shoti yo muromo wangu.

Iye uno njeve ngaazwe zvinovereketwa ndi Mweya kuzviara. Kwaari unonyisa ndinozomupa mana yakafishika ndinozomupazve buwe rakachena, no panyezuru po buwe pakatahwa zina ibza, risikaziviki ngo umweni kwega ngo uwo unoriashira.
Tarira ngirosi yo chiara chiri mu Tiyatira: Unonanga izvi Mwana wa Mwari, uno majiso akadari ngo murazvu wo muriro, no tshoka jake jakadari ngo thusi rinon'anikira.
Ndinoziva mishando yako no rudo rwako no kugonda kwako no kushandira kwako, no kusengerera kwako, nokuti mishando yako yokugumisira inopinda yokutanga.
Asi ndinokushora ngo ichi, kuti unotendera mwanakaji Jezabheri, uwo unoti uri muprofeti, naye unojijisa no kupaukisa varanda vangu kuti vaombe nokuha zvakabaihwa miezaniso yo kudira.
Neni ndakamupa nguva yokuti atenderuke, asi inga asikadi kutenderuka kubva mukuomba kwake.
Vona, ndinozomukandira mumubede, naavo vanoomba naye mu dambujiko guru, kuti vasikatenderuki kumishando yavo.
Neni ndinozouraya vana vake ngo rufu. No zviara zvese zvinozoziva kuti inini ndiriye unopshakisisa mipinimijo no mwoyo, neni ndinozomupa umwe ngaumwe kudari ngo mushando yenyu.
Asi ndinoti kwomuri, imwimwi mwakasara mu Tiyatira, kwavari vasina uku kujijiswa, vasikazivi kuziva kujika kwa Sathani, ndinoti kwomuri: Andizomuthikisi mutwaro umweni.
Asi icho chomunacho batisisanyi mbhera ndiviye.
No uwo unonyisa, no unongwarira mishando yangu pakugumisira, kwaari ndinozopa simba panyezuru po majinja:
Naye unozotonga ngo ndonga yo simbi, kudari ngo zvijuvi zvo muumbi zvinophwanywa kuyita zviviya; kudari ngo zvo ndakaashira kuna Baba wangu.
Neni ndinomupa ndhondo inozwi masase.
Iye uno njeve ngaazwe chinovereketwa ndi Mweya kuzviara.
“Tarira ngirosi yo chiara chiri mu Saradhesi: Unonanga izvi uwo uno Mweya minomwe ya Mwari, no ndhondo nomwe; ndinoziva mishando yako kuti uno zina rokuti unopona, asi wakafa.
Rinda, no kugwinyisa izvo zvasara, zvoda kufa, ngokuti andivoni kuti mishando yako yakaperera pamberi pa Mwari wangu.
Ndizvo cherecheja maashirire nokupa kwo wakayita, uzvingwarire no kutenderuka. Ndizvo kuti usikarindi, ndinozoviya kudari ngo mbavha, newe auzozivi nguva yo ndinozoviya ndiyo kwouri.
Asi uno mazina mashomani mu Saradhesi, oavo vasikazivi kusvipisa zvokusimira zvavo, navo vanozofamba neni vakasimira zvakachena, ngokuti vanosisira.
Iye unonyisa unozosimijwa kudaro ngo zvo kusimira zvakachena, neni andizojimi zina rake mutshamba yo kupona, ndinozotenda zina rake pamberi pa Baba wangu no pamberi po ngirosi jake.
Iye uno njeve ngaazwe zvinovereketwa ngo Mweya kuzviara.”
Tarira ngirosi yo chiara chiri mu Firadhefiya: Unonanga izvi wakachena, uno gwinyiso, uno mugogo wa Dhavhidha, uwo unobewura akunazve unozokonya, naye akonya akunazve unobewura.
Ndinoziva mishando yako, vona ndakadira pamberi pako ruvhi rwakabewuhwa, akuna mundhu angarukonya, uno simba doko, wakangwarira izwi rangu auzivi kuramba zina rangu.
Vonayi, ndinokupa vamweni vo nyumba yo kudira ya Sathani, vanozwi vajudha, asivopi, asi vanonyepa: Vona ndinozoita kuti vaviye no kudira pamberi po tsoka jako, no kuziva kuti ndakakuda.
Ngokuti wakangwarira izwi rangu ro kusengerera neni ndinozokungwarira ngo mukuvo wo kutambujika unoviya panyezuru po nyika yese, kueja avo vanogara mu nyika.
Ndinokasira kuviya: Batisisa chounacho kuti asazovapo mundhu unozokutorera junguja rako.

Uwo unonyisa ndinozomuita njiki muthemperi ra Mwari wangu, aasazobudimwo: Neni ndinozotara panyezeru pake zina ra Mwari wangu, no zina ro dhoropa ra Mwari wangu, riri Jerusarema ibza rinojaka kubva mugore, kubva kuna Mwari wangu, no zina rangu ibza.
Iye uno njeve ngaazwe chinovereketwa ndi Mweya kuzviara.
“Tarira ngirosi yo chiara chiri mu Raodhikiya: Unonanga izvi uwo uri Ameni, uri chapupu chakagondeka chino gwinyiso, muambi wo zvakasikwa zva Mwari:
Ndinoziva mishando yako kuti autondhori nokuti kupisa. Ndinoda kuti utondhore nokuti upise.
Ndizvo ngokuti unojiya usikapisi nokuti kutondhora, ndinozokurucha mumuromo wangu,
ngokuti unoti: Ndiri guruja, ndakapfuma, anditami chiro, usikazivi kuti uri tsereketwa, no unotambujika uri murombo no uri bofu no mutitinini.

Ndinokupanga kuti utenge kwendiri mukore wakanyunguruswa ngo muriro kuti uite guruja, no zvokufuka zvakachena kuti ujisimije, kuti kupsheruka kwo utitinini hwako usazovoneka. No mutombo wokuzoja majiso, kuti uvone.
Avo vese vondinoda, ndinovathusa no kuvapangira; ndizvo vangirira utenderuke.
Vonayi, ndinoima paruvhi no kuguguja; kudari uripo mundhu unorizwa izwi rangu no kubewura musuvo, ndinozonghwina kwaari, ndihe naye, naye ahe neni.
Iye unonyisa ndinozomuita kuti agare neni padendemaro rangu, kudari ndini ndakanyisavo, ndatogara na Baba wangu padendemaro ravo.
Iye uno njeve ngaazwe zvinovereketwa ndi Mweya kuzviara.”

Ngosure kwo izvi ndakaringira, ndikavona, ruvhi rwakabewuhwa mugore, no izwi ro kutanga rondakazwa rakadari ngo kurira kwo mbhayapaya rechivereketa neni, rechiti: “Kwira pano, neni ndinozokupangijira izvo zvinosisira kuitika sure kwo izvi.”
Paripo ndayiva mumweya: Vona, rayivapo dendemaro rakagajikwa mugore, ngo panyezuru paro paigara umwe.
No uwo waigarapo kuringirika kwake inga kwakadari ngo buwe ro jasipa no ro sadiyo, kwayivapozve utawahumbe hwechitendeneja dendemaro, kuringirika kwaho inga kwakadari ngo buwe ro simaragadiyo.

No kutendeneja dendemaro, kwayivapo madendemaro ari makumi maviri na marongomuna, no panyezuru po madendemaro paigara vakuru vari makumi maviri na varongomuna, vakasimira zvakachena, no majunguja omukore ayiva mumusoro mwavo.
Kwakabudazve kudendemaro mbheni no mazwi no kutindhira; kwayivapo zvivheneko zvinomwe zvo muriro zvechibwaka pamberi po dendemaro, izvo zviri mweya minomwe ya Mwari;
no pamberi po dendemaro pano jombe rakadari ngo buwe ro girazi, no pakati po dendemaro no kuritendeneja kwayivapo zvisikwa zvirongomuna zvaipona, zvakazara ngo majiso pamberi no sure.

No chisikwa chokutanga chayinga chakadari ngo mbhondoro, no chisikwa chochipiri chayinga chakadari ngo konyana ro n'ombe, no chisikwa cho chitatu chayinga chino hope yakadari ngo yo mundhu, no chisikwa cho chirongomuna chayinga chakadari ngo goji rinomburuka.

No zvisikwa zvirongomuna zvaipona zvese, chimwe ngachimwe chazvo chayiva no mapapiro matandhatu, zvakazara majiso kutenderera kunja no mukati, nazvo azvizivi kuzorora masikati no usiku, zvechiti: “Wakachena, Wakachena, Wakachena, Mambo Mwari Unosimbarese, waindovapo, no uripo, no unozoviya.”
Naapo zvisikwa zvinopona zvinopa kukuja no kureremeja no kubonga kwaari unogara padendemaro, unopona mbhera narini.
Vakuru vari makumi maviri na varongomuna vanozowa pasi pamberi po uwo unogara padendemaro, no kumudira uwo unopona mbhera narini, navo vanozokandira majunguja avo pamberi po dendemaro, vechiti:
“Unosisira, iwewe Mambo wedu na Mwari wedu, kuashira kukujwa no kureremejwa no simba. Wakasika zviro zvese, na ngo kuda kwako zvakavapo, zvakasikwa.”
Zvino ndakavona munyara yo kumuho yo uwo wakagara pa dendemaro, bhuku rakatahwa pakati no kunja, rakanamihwa ngo zvinamiro zvinomwe.
Ndakavona ngirosi ino simba yechidanijira ngo izwi guru, yechiti: “Ndiyani unosisira kubewura bhuku, no kusunungura zvinamiro zvaro?”
Inga kusina mundhu mugore nokuti pa nyezuru po nyika, nokuti ngo pasi po nyika, waikona kubewura bhuku nokuti kuriringira.
Apo ndakachema kukurutu ngokuti inga kusina mundhu wakavoneka wakasisira kubewura bhuku nokuti kuriringira.
No umwe wo vakuru wakati kwendiri: Usachema: Vona, Mbhondoro yo ruji rwa Judha, miji hwa Dhavhidha hwakanyisa kuti abewura bhuku, no zvinamiro zvinomwe zvaro.

Zvino ndakavona pakati po dendemaro no po zvisikwa zvirongomuna zvinopona, no po vakuru, rayinga rakayima Bvuta rinonga rakaurawa, rayinga rino nyanga nomwe, no majiso manomwe, izvo zviri mweya minomwe ya Mwari, yakatumwa mu nyika mwese.
Bvuta rakwedera, rikatora bhuku kubva ku nyara yo kumuho yo uwo wayigara padendemaro.

Naapo rayinga ratora bhuku, zvisikwa zvirongomuna zvinopona, no vakuru vari makumi maviri no varongomuna vakawa pasi pamberi po Bvuta, umwe ngaumwe wavo uno chidyangari no mukheyo yo mukore, yakazara ngo mutombo ino gwema, iri mikumbiro yo vakacheneswa.

Navo vakayimba nduyo ipsha vechiti: “Unosisira iwewe kutora bhuku no kubewura zvinamiro zvaro, ngokuti iwewe wakaurawa, ukatitengera kuna Mwari ngo ngazi yako, kubva ku majinja ese, no ndimi jese, no vandhu vese, no ku marusinga ese.
Newe wakavaita majimambo no vapristi kuna Mwari wedu; navo vanotonga pa nyezuru po nyika.”
Zvino ndakavona, ndikazwa izwi ro ngirosi jakawanda jayinga jakatendeneja dendemaro, no zvisikwa zvinopona, no vakuru, no uwandu hwajo hwayiva zviuru no zviuru zvo zviuru.
Jechiti ngo izwi guru: “Rakasisira Bvuta rakaurawa kuashira simba, no upfumi, no ungwaru, no kugwinya, no kureremejwa, no uthende, no kuirikijwa.”

No zviro zvese zvakasikwa zviri mugore, no zviri mu nyika, no zviri pasi po nyika, no zviri mujombe, nazvo zvese zviri mukati mwazvo, ndakazvizwa zvechiti; kwaari unogara padendemaro, no ku Bvuta, ngakuve no kukujwa, no kureremejwa, no uthende, no kutonga, mbhera narini.
No zvisikwa zvirongomuna zvinopona, zvakati [Ameni]! No vakuru vakawa pasi, vakadira.
Zvino ndakavona, Bvuta rayinga rabewura chimwe cho zvinamiro zvinomwe, ndakazwa chimwe cho zvisikwa zvinopona chechiti ngo izwi rinonga ro mutindhiro: “Viya!”
Ndakaringira, rayivapo hachi rakachena no uwo wakarigada wayiva no uta; wakapuwa junguja: Naye wakabuda echinyisa, no kunyisa.
Naapo ayinga abewura chinamiro chochipiri, ndakazwa chisikwa chochipiri chinopona, chechiti: “Viya!”
No hachi rimweni rakapshuka rakabuda; naye wakarigada wakapuwa simba ro kubvisa kunyarara mu nyika, nokuti vaurayane, wakapuwazve shoti huru.
Naapo yabewura chinamiro chochitatu, ndakazwa chisikwa chochitatu chinopona, chechiti: “Viya!” Ndakaringira ndikavona, hachi rakasvipa, no uwo wakarigada wayiva no chipimo munyara yake.

Ndakazwa rinonga izwi pakati po zvisikwa zvirongomuna zvinopona, rechiti: “Chipimo cho koroni chinotengwa ngo dhenariyo, no zvipimo zvitatu zvo bare zvinotengwa ngo dhenariyo, usashaishira mafuta no vhini.”
Naapo abewura chinamiro cho chirongomuna, ndakazwa izwi ro chisikwa cho chirongomuna chinopona, rechiti: “Viya!”

Ndakaringira ndikavona, hachi rakacheneruka no uwo wakarigada wakapuwa zina rokuti, Kufa, no Haidhesi rakamutevera. Wakapuwazve simba panyezuru pavo vari murupande ro chirongomuna ro nyika kuti auraye ngo shoti, na ngo njara, na ngo ndhenda, na ngo zvikara zvo mu nyika.
Naapo abewura chinamiro cho chishanu, ndakavona ngo pasi po altari mwoyo yo avo vakaurawa ngo ndava yo izwi ra Mwari, na ngo ndava yo uchapupu hwo vakapupura ndihwo.
Vakadanijira ngo izwi guru, vechiti: “Mukuvo wakaitawani kureba, A Tenzi, iwewe wakachena no uno gwinyiso, wo usikatongi no kuhwirijira mu ngazi yedu kuna avo vanogara mu nyika?”
Vakapuwa umwe ngaumwe, nguvo jakachena: Kwakanangwa kwavari kuti vazorore mukuvo mudoko, mbhera kuitike kuurawa kwo varanda pamwepo navo, no hama javo, vanozourawa kudari ndivo.
Neni ndakavona apo abewura chinamiro cho chitandhatu, kwakavapo kuzungunyuka kukurutu kwo nyika, no zuva rakasvipiswa kudari ngo jira ro mavhiri, no mweji wese wakaitwa inga ngazi;
no ndhondo jo mugore jakawira pa nyika, kudari ngo mukuyu unowisa makuyu awo asikazivi kuibva, apo wazungunyiswa ngo dutu guru.
Denga rakabviswa kudari ngo tshamba apo yechipetwa, no matundhu ese no zvirundu zvakabviswa pandau yazvo.
No majimambo onyika, no vazvare, no nduna huru, no maguruja, no vakagwinya, no muranda wese, no wakasununguka wese, vakafindara mu mapako, no mu mapuwe omatundhu,
Navo vakati kumitundhu no kumapuwe: “Tiwirenyi, mutifishe kubva kuhope yo uwo unogara padendemaro, no kubva kwo ushungu hwo Bvuta:
Ngokuti raguma zuva guru ro ushungu hwavo, ndiyani uno simba ro kuima?”

Ngosure kwo ichi ndakavona ngirosi murongomuna jakayima kumativi marongomuna onyika, jakabata madutu marongomuna onyika, kuti dutu risazofurija mu nyika, nokuti mu jombe, nokuti panyezuru po miti yese.
Apo ndakavona ngirosi imweni, yechikwira kubva kumabvazuva, ino chinamiro cha Mwari unopona, nayo yakadanijira ngo izwi guru kuno ijo ngirosi murongomuna, jakapuwa kushaishira nyika no jombe,
yechiti: “Musashaishira nyika nokuti jombe, nokuti muti naumwe, mbhera tadira chinamiro pa huma jo varanda va Mwari wedu.”
Ndakazwa uwandu hwo avo vakanamihwa, vayiva zana no makumi marongomuna na marongomuna ozviuru (144.000), vakanamihwa chinamiro kubva kujinja rimwe ngarimwe ro vana vo Israeri.
Kujinja ra Judha vakanamihwa chinamiro vari gumi na zviviri zvo zviuru (12.000), kujinja ra Rubheni gumi na zviviri zvo zviuru (12.000), kujinja ra Gadhi gumi na zviviri zvo zviuru (12.000),
kujinja ra Asheri gumi na zviviri zvo zviuru (12.000), kujinja ra Naftari gumi na zviviri zvo zviuru (12.000), kujinja ra Manasa gumi na zviviri zvo zviuru (12.000),
Kujinja ra Simioni gumi na zviviri zvo zviuru (12.000), kujinja ra Revi gumi na zviviri zvo zviuru (12.000), kujinja ra Isakari gumi na zviviri zvo zviuru (12.000).

Kujinja ra Zabhurona gumi na zviviri zvo zviuru (12.000) kujinja ra Josefa gumi na zviviri zvo zviuru (12.000), kujinja ra Benjamini rakanamihwa chinamiro kuna vari gumi na zviviri zvo zviuru (12.000).

Ngosure kwo izvi ndakaringira ndikavona, mbungano huru isikakoni kuverengwa ngo mundhu, inobva kumajinja ese, no marusinga ese no vo vandhu vese, no vo ndimi jese, vakayima pamberi po dendemaro no pamberi po Bvuta, vakasimira nguvo jakachena vano matavi omichindu munyara javo;
vakadanijira ngo izwi guru, vechiti: “Ruponeso ruri kuna Mwari wedu unogara padendemaro, nokuna Bvuta.”
Ngirosi jese jayima jechitendeneja dendemaro, no kutendeneja vakuru no zvisikwa zvirongomuna zvinopona; jakawa pasi pamberi po dendemaro ngo hope jajo, jakadira Mwari,
jechiti: “Ameni, kukujwa no uthende, no ungwaru, no kubonga, no kureremejwa, no simba, no kugwinya, ngazvive kuna Mwari wedu, mbhera narini. Ameni!”
No umwe wo vakuru wakabvunjisa, echiti: Kwendiri: “Ndiyani ava vakasimira nguvo jakachena vanobva kwapi?”
Ndakati kwaari: “Mambo wangu, ndiwe unoziva.” Naye wakati kwendiri: “Ava ndivo vanobuda kubva kudambujiko guru, navo vakasuka nguvo javo, vakajichenesa mungazi yo Bvuta.”
Ngo iyi ndava vari pamberi po dendemaro ra Mwari, vanomushandira masikati no usiku muthemperi rake. No uwo unogara padendemaro unozovangwarira mutende rake.
Avachazozwi njara, nokuti nyota; zve, zuva arichazovapisi, nokuti kupisa kumweni:
Ngokuti Bvuta riri pakati po dendemaro rinozovahavisa, no kuvatungamirira kuenda navo kuzvinyuka zvokumwa yo kupona. Na Mwari unozopukuta misoji yese kubva kumajiso avo.
Bvuta rabewura chinamiro cho chinomwe, kwakavapo kunyarara mugore unonga mukuvo unoda kuyita bindikati ro nguva.
Neni ndakavona ngirosi nomwe jakayima pamberi pa Mwari, jakapuwa mbhayapaya nomwe.

No ngirosi imweni yakaviya ikayima phedo po altari ino chimujiyo cho mukore cho kupisira mutombo uno gwema, yakapuwa mutombo wakawanda wo kupisa uno gwema, kuti yiudire panyezuru po altari ro mukore rayiva pamberi po dendemaro, pamwepo no mikumbiro yo vakacheneswa.
No usi wo mutombo wo kupisa uno gwema wakakwira pamwepo no mukumbiro yo vakacheneswa pamberi pa Mwari wechibuda munyara yo ngirosi.
No ngirosi yakatora chimujiyo cho kupisira mitombo, nayo yakachizaja ngo muriro wo pa altari, ikaukandira panyezuru po nyika, kwakavapo kutindhira, no mazwi, no mbheni, no kuzungunyika kwo nyika.
No ngirosi nomwe jayiva no mbhayapaya nomwe, jakanasirira kuti jirije.

Yokutanga yakarija, kwakavapo matarara, no muriro, zvakavhenganijwa no ngazi, nazvo zvakakandihwa panyezuru po nyika. No rupande rwo chitatu rwo nyika rakapiswa, rupande rwo chitatu rwo nyika rakapiswa no mwenje wese muvishi wakapiswa.
No ngirosi yochipiri yakarija, no chakadari ngo dundhu guru chinobwaka ngo muriro chakakandihwa mu jombe no rupande rwo chitatu ro jombe rakaita ngazi,
no rupande rwo chitatu rwo zvisikwa zvo mujombe zvinopona zvakafa, no rupande rwo chitatu ro ngarava rakaphwanywa.
No ngirosi yo chitatu yakarija, ndhodho huru yakawa kubva mugore, yechibwaka kudari ngo chibani, yakawira panyezuru porupande rwo chitatu ro murambo, no panyezuru pozvinyuka zvokumwa,
no zina ro ndhondo rakazwi, Chinovava; no rupande rwo chitatu ro kumwa yakavaviswa; no vandhu vazhinji vakafa ngo kumwa iyo ngokuti yakavaviswa.

No ngirosi yo chirongomuna yakarija, no rupande rwo chitatu ro zuva rakarohwa, no rupande rwo chitatu rwo mweji, no rupande rwo chitatu rwo ndhondo; kuti rupande rwo chitatu razvo risvipiswe, no masikati asazojeka rupande raro rwo chitatu, no usiku ngokudaro.

Neni ndakaringira ndikazwa goji rechimburuka pakati po mugore, rechiti ngo izwi guru: “Ihehe, ihehe, ihehe kwavari vanogara panyezuru po nyika ngo ndava yo mazwi amweni o mbhayapaya jo ngirosi ndhatu jichazorija.”
Ngirosi yo chinoshanu yakarija, neni ndakavona ndhondo yakabva mugore ikawa pa nyika, yakapuwa mugogo wo rindi rakajikisisa.
Nayo yakabewura rindi rakajikisisa, no usi wakakwira kubva murindi umwo, wakadari ngo usi wo choto chakakura. No zuva, no mweya zvakasvipiswa ngo ndava yo usi wo rindi iro.
No ndongwe jakabuda mu usi, kuviya panyezuru po nyika, jakapuwa simba rakadari ngo ro zvinyavada zvo mu nyika.
Jakabvunjwa kuti jisazoshaishira mwenje wo nyika, nokuti chiro chimweni chakasvipirikira, nokuti muti, asi vega vandhu vasina chinamiro cha Mwari pa huma javo.
Ajizivi kupuwa simba ro kuvauraya, asi kuti jivahwajise mweji mushanu: No kuhwajisa kwajo inga kwakadari ngo kuhwajisa kwo chinyavada apo charuma mundhu.
Ngaao mazuva vandhu vanozopshaka kufa, vasikakuwani; no kudisisa kuti vafe, no kufa kunozotiza kubva kwavari.
No miyemo yo ndongwe ijo yayiva yakadari ngo yo mahachi, akanasirihwa kurwa, no panyezuru po musoro yajo panonga payiva no majunguja akadari ngo omukore. No hope jajo inga jakadari ngo jo vandhu.
Jayiva no bvuji rakadari ngo bvuji ro vanakaji, no mazino ajo inga akadari ngo ombhondoro.
Jayiva no chivhikiro cho diti chakadari ngo simbi; no kutindhira kwo mapapiro ajo inga kwakadari ngo kwo ngoro jo kurwa, no kwo mahachi akawanda echigogoma kuenda ku imbi.
Jayiva no mwishe yakadari ngo yo zvinyavada, no chisomo; no kumwishe yajo kwayiva no simba ro kuremaja vandhu mweji mushanu.
Jayiva na mambo wajo, yayiva ngirosi yo rindi rakajikisisa, zina rayo ngo chihebheru ndi Abhadhoni, ngo chigiriki ina zina rokuti, Aporiyoni.
Dambujiko ro kutanga rakapinda; vona, kuchaviya matambujiko maviri ngo sure kwo izvi.
No ngirosi yo chitandhatu yakarija mbhayapaya, neni ndakazwa izwi rechibva pa nyanga jo altari ro mukore riri pamberi pa Mwari,
rechiti kuna ngirosi yo chitandhatu, yayiva no mbhayapaya: “Sunungura ngirosi murongomuna, jakasungwa pamurambo mukuru wo Ufrate.”
No ngirosi murongomuna jakasununguhwa, jakanasirihwa nguva no zuva no mweji no gore kuti jiuraye rupande ro chitatu ro vandhu.
No uwandu wo hondo jo vanogadha mahachi hwayiva omazana maviri wo zviuru zvo zviuru (200.000.000). Ndakazwa uwandu hwavo.

Ngokudaro ndakavona mahachi muchivoniso naavo vakaagada, vano zvivhikiro zvo diti, zvo muriro no hwo hiyasinto no hwo sorufa. No musoro jo mahachi inga jakadari ngo mbhondoro, no mumiromo jao mwakabuda muriro pamwepo no usi no sorufa.
Ngo nyatwa iji ndhatu rupande ro chitatu ro vandhu rakaurawa, ngo muriro no usi no sorufa, izvo zvakabuda kumiromo yao.
Ngokuti simba ro mahachi rayiva mu miromo yao no kumwishe yao, ngokuti mwishe yao yayinga yakadari ngo nyoka yayiva no musoro; ndiwo airemaja.

No vamweni vandhu, vasikazivi kuurawa ngo nyatwa iji, avazivi kutenderuka kubva mumishando yo nyara javo, kuti vasazodira mabzoka, no muezaniso yo kudira, yo mukore no yo sirivha, no yo thusi no yo mapuwe no yo miti; iyo isikakoni kuvona, nokuti kuzwa, nokuti kufamba;
zve, avazivi kutenderuka kubva mukuuraya kwavo, nokuti mukuroya kwavo, nokuti mukuomba kwavo, nokuti mukuba kwavo.

Neni ndakavona ngirosi imweni yakagwinya yechibzuka kubva mudenga, yakafuka gore; no utawahumbe hwayiva panyezuru po musoro wayo, no hope yayo yayinga yakadari ngo zuva, no tshoka jayo jayiva jakadari ngo mirazvu yo muriro;
inga yakabata munyara yayo chibhuku chakabeuka. Yakatsika tshoka yayo yo kumuho panyezuru po jombe, no yo kuboshwe panyezuru po nyika.
Yakadanijira ngo izwi guru, kudari ngo kurira kwo mbhondoro; naapo yadanijira, kutindhira kunomwe kwakatindhira.
Naapo kutindhira kunomwe kwayinga kwatindhira, ndayinga ndooda kutara, ndakazwa izwi rechibva mugore, rechiti: “Konya izvo zvakavereketwa ngo kutindhira kunomwe, usazvitara.”
No ngirosi yo ndakavona yakayima panyezuru po jombe no po nyika, yakamusa nyara yayo yo kumuho mugore,
ikapika ndiye unopona mbhera narini, uwo wakasika denga no izvo zvirimwo, no nyika no izvo zvirimwo, no jombe no izvo zvirimwo kuti kusachazovapo mukuvo wo kunonoka.
Asi Ngo mazuva o izwi ro ngirosi yo chinomwe, apo yayinga yoda kurija, ngo uwo mukuvo chakafishika cha Mwari chinozopera kudari ngo zvaakananga kuvaranda vake vaprofeti.
No izwi ro ndakazwa rechibva mugore, rakavereketazve neni, rechiti: “Endai utore chibhuku chakabeuka chiri munyara yo ngirosi yakayima panyezuru po jombe no panyezuru po nyika.”
Ndakaenda kuno ngirosi iyo, ndikati kweiri: “Ndipe chibhuku. Nayo yakati kwendiri, chitore, uchihe; kunozoita kuti ndani yako ivave, asi mumuromo wako chinozotapira kudari ngo uchi.”
Ndakatora chibhuku munyara yo ngirosi, ndakachiha mumuromo wangu chaitapira kudari ngo uchi; naapo ndakaha, ndani yangu yakavava.
Jakati kwendiri, Kunosisira kuti uprofetezve ngo ndava yo vandhu vazhinji, no majinja, no ndimi no majimambo.
Ndakapuwa njanga yakadari ngo mudondoro, kukazwi: “Muka, uende, upime kukura kwo themperi ra Mwari, no altari, naavo vanodiremwo.”
Asi ruvanje ruri kunja kwo themperi ruregere, usaripima; ngokuti uhwo hwakapuwa kuno vo majinja: Navo vanozotsikatsika pasi ngo tshoka javo dhoropa rakachena mweji iri makumi marongomuna na miviri.
Ndinozopa simba kuzvapupu zvangu zviviri, kuti zviprofete mazuva ari chiuru no mazana maviri, no makumi matandhatu, (1.260) zvakasimira machira omasaku.
Ava vari miti muviri yo maorivhe, no zvigajikiro zviviri zvo zvibani zvinoyima pamberi pa Mambo wo nyika.
Kuti aripo mundhu unoda kuvaremaja, muriro unobuda kumuromo yavo wechiuraya mapandu avo; kuti aripo mundhu unoda kuvaremaja, ngo iyi njira kunosisira kuti aurawe.

Ava vano simba ro kukonya denga, kuti isazona mvura ngo mazuva okuprofeta kwavo, navo vano simba panyezuru po kumwa kuitsanduja kuti iite ngazi, no kurova nyika ngo matambujiko ese, ngo nguva jese jo vanoda.
Naapo vapeja uchapupu hwavo, chikara chinokwira kubva murindi rakajikisisa chinozoambana navo, no kuvanyisa, no kuvauraya.
No miviri yavo yakafa inozorashwa mugwanja ro dhoropa guru, rinozwi ngo kuezanisira kuti, Sodhoma no Egipite, paakakohomehwavo Mambo wavo.
Navo vanobva ku vandhu, no marusinga, no ndimi, no majinja, vanozoringira miviri yavo yakafa, mazuva matatu no bindikati vasikatenderi kuti miviri yavo yakafa ivigwe mu maiba.
Naavo vanogara mu nyika vanodakara ndivo, no kupembera; vanozotumirana zvipo umwe kwo umweni; ngokuti ava vaprofeti vaviri vakatambuja ava vanogara mu nyika.
Ngosure kwo mazuva matatu no bindikati, mweya wo kurarama unobva kuna Mwari wakanghwina mukati mwavo, vakayima ngo tshoka javo; nokutya kukurutu kwakagumira avo vakavavona.
Vakazwa izwi guru rechibva mugore, rechiti kwavari: Kwiranyi kuno. Vakakwira mudenga vari mugore; no mapandu avo akavaringira;

ngo iyo nguva kwayivapo kuzungunyika kukuru kwo nyika, no rupande rwo gumi rodhoropa rakawa vakaurawa vandhu vari zviuru zvinomwe (7.000) mukuzungunyika kwo nyika; no vamweni vakatya, vakairikija Mwari wo mugore.
Dambujiko ro chipiri rapinda, vona, dambujiko rechitatu rinokasira kuviya.
No ngirosi yo chinomwe yakarija mbhayapaya; kwakazwika izwi guru mugore rechiti: “Umambo hwo nyika hwayita hwa Mambo wedu, no hwa Kristu wake, naye unozotonga mbhera narini.”
No vakuru vari makumi maviri na varongomuna, vanogara pamberi pa Mwari, panyezuru pomadendemaro avo, vakawa ngo hope javo, vakadira Mwari,
vechiti: “Tinokubonga, A Mambo Mwari, Unosimbarese, uwo uripo, no wayivapo, ngokuti wakajitorera simba rako guru, ukatonga.”

No majinja akatseneka, no ushungu hwako hwakaviya, no mukuvo wo vakafa kuti vatongwe, no mukuvo wo kupa musharo kuno varanda vako vaprofeti, no kuvakacheneswa, no kwavari vanotya zina rako, vadoko no vakuru, no kuuraya avo vonoparaja nyika.
Themperi ra Mwari rakabewuhwa mugore; mwakavoneka muthemperi rake bhokisi ro chitenderano chake; kwakavapo mbheni, no mazwi, no kutindhira, no kuzungunyika kwo nyika, no matarara makurutu.
No chivoniso chikuru chakaoneka mugore; mwanakaji akasimira zuva, no mweji uri pasi po tsoka jake, no panyezuru po musoro wake payiva no junguja ro ndhondo jiri gumi na mbiri.
Wayiva no mimba, wakachema, echihwajihwa ngo kubereka, no kuhwajihwa ngo kusununguka.
No chivoniso chimweni chakavoneka mugore, vona; dragoni guru rakapshuka rino musoro minomwe no nyanga jiri gumi, no panyezuru pomusoro yaro no majunguja manomwe.
No mwishe waro unokweva rupande rwo chitatu rwo ndhondo jo mugore, rikajikandira panyika; no dragoni rakayima pamberi po mwanakaji wayinga woda kubereka, kuti rihe mwana wake aberekwa.
Naye wakabereka mwana, mwana wo rume, unozotonga majinja ese ngo ndonga yo simbi: No mwana wakakwijwa kuna Mwari, no kudendemaro rake.
No mwanakaji wakatizira mu bani, apo payiva no ndau yakanasirihwa ndi Mwari, kuti vamurere apo mazuva ari chiuru chimwe no mazana maviri no makumi matandhatu (1.260).
Kwakavapo kurwa mugore: Mikaeri pamwepo no ngirosi jake jechirwa no dragoni; no dragoni naro rakarwa pamwepo no ngirosi jaro.
Jakanyiswa, no ndau yajo aizivi kuchazovapo mugore.
No dragoni guru rakakandihwa pasi, iyo nyoka sharuka, inozozwi ndi Dhiabhorosi, na Sathani, muchengeji wo nyika yese; iye wakakandihwa pasi mu nyika, no ngirosi jake jakarashwa pasi pamwepo naye.

Neni ndakazwa izwi guru rechibva mugore, rechiti: “Zvino rwaguma ruponeso, no simba, no umambo, zva Mwari wedu no simba ra Kristu wake: Ngokuti mupumbhi wo hama jedu wakandihwa pasi, uwo unovaitira ndava pa mberi pa Mwari wedu masikati no usiku.”
Navo vakamunyisa ngo ngazi yo Bvuta, na ngo izwi ro uchapupu hwavo; navo avazivi kuda kupona kwavo mbhera mukufa.
Ndizvo dakaranyi imwimwi matenga, nemwi munogara mukati mwao. Ihehe ku nyika no kujombe; ngokuti Dhiabhorosi wakajaka kwomuri, ano ushungu hukurutu, ngokuti unoziva kuti nguva yake yaafupi.
Naapo dragoni rayinga ravona kuti rakakandihwa pasi, rakatambuja uwo mwanakaji wakabereka mwana wo rume.
Mwanakaji uwo wakapuwa mapapiro maviri ogoji guru, kuti amburuke kuenda mu bani kundau yake, paanorehwa mukuvo no mikuvo, no bindikati ro mukuvo kubva mu hope yo nyoka.
No nyoka yakabudisa kumwa mumuromo wayo kudari ngo murambo, sure kwo mwanakaji kuti atohwe ngo murambo.
No nyika yakabetsera mwanakaji, ikabewura muromo wayo, no kumija murambo, uwo wakabudiswa ngo dragoni mumuromo waro.
No dragoni rakachenekera mwanakaji, rakaenda, rikaambana no vamweni vana vake vanongwarira mipango ya Mwari, vechibata uchapupu hwa Jesu:
No dragoni rakayima panyezuru po musanga wo jombe.

Ndakayima panyezuru po musanga wo jombe. Ndakavona chikara chechibuda mujombe, chino nyanga jiri gumi, no musoro munomwe, no panyezuru ponyanga yacho payiva no majunguja ari gumi, no panyezuru po musoro yacho payiva no mazina okutuka Mwari.

No chikara chendakavona inga chakadari ngo khamba, no tshoka jacho jayiva jakadari ngo beya, no muromo wacho wayinga wakadari ngo wo mbhondoro; no dragoni rakachipa simba raro, no dendemaro raro, no kupanga kukuru.
Ndakavona umwe wo musoro wacho, kudari inga wakarohwa mbhera ufe; no vonje rokufa kwacho rakapora: No nyika yakashamiswa ngo ndava yo chikara,
navo vakadira dragoni ngokuti ndiro rakapa chikara simba raro; vakadira chikara, vechiti: Ndiyani ungaezaniswa no chikara? Ndiyanizve uno simba ro kurwa nacho?
Chakapuwa muromo wo kuvereketa zvakakura no kutuka; chakapuwazve simba rokuti chiite mishando yacho mweji iri makumi marongomuna na miviri.
Nacho chakabewura muromo wacho kutuka Mwari, no kutuka zina rake, no tende rake, navo vanogara mugore.
Chakapuwazve kuambana no vakacheneswa, no kuvanyisa, chakapuwazve simba panyezuru po marusinga ese, no vandhu, no ndimi, no majinja,
vese vanogara panyezuru po nyika vanozochidira, vano mazina asikazivi kutahwa mubhuku ro kupona ro Bvuta rakaurawa kubvira mukuemeswa kwo nyika.
Kuti aripo uno njeve ngaazwe.
Kuti aripo unoda kukwevera mundhu mukusungwa, iye unozoendavo mukusungwa. Kuti aripo unouraya ngo shoti, iye unozourawavo ngo shoti. Pano ndipo panokusengerera no kugonda kwo vakacheneswa.
Ndakavona chikara chimweni chechikwira kubuda mu nyika; chayiva no nyanga mbiri jakadari ngo jo bvuta, chakavereketa kudari ngo dragoni.
Chinoshandisa simba ro chikara chokutanga mukuvona kwacho, chinoyita kuti nyika navo vanogaremwo vadire chikara chokutanga, chayiva no vonje ro kufa rakapora.
Chinoyita mivoniso mikuru, kuti murirozve ubzuke panyezuru po nyika wechibva mugore mukuvona kwo vandhu.

Nacho chinochengejera avo vanogara mu nyika, ngo ndava yo mishamiso yakapuwa kwechiri kuti chiite pamberi po chikara; chechinanga kwavari vanogara mu nyika kuti vayite muezaniso wo chikara, chakabaiwa ngo shoti chikapona.
Chakapuwa simba ro kupa mweya kumuezaniso wo chikara kuti muezaniso wechikara uite zvese, kuvereketa, no kuyita kuti vese vasikadiri muezaniso wo chikara vaurawe.
Chinoyita kuti vese vadoko no vakuru, no vapfumi, no varombo, no vakasununguka, no varanda, vapuwe chivoniso ku nyara yavo yo kumuho, nokuti pa huma javo;
zve kuti mundhu mumwe asazokona kutenga nokuti kutengesa kwega uwo uno chivoniso, kunoti zina rechikara, nokuti chiverengo cho zina racho.
Pano ndipo pano ungwaru. Iye unozwisisa ngaaverenge chiverengo cho chikara; ngokuti chiri chiverengo cho mundhu: No chiverengo chake chiri mazana matandhatu no makumi matandhatu na matandhatu (666).
Neni ndakaringira, ndikavona Bvuta rakayima pa dundhu ro Zioni, rinavo vari zana no makumi marongomuna na marongomuna wo zviuru (144.000), vano zina rake, no zina ra Baba wake rakatahwa pa huma javo.
Ndakazwa izwi rakabva mugore rinonga chaungu cho kumwa zhinji, no izwizve ro kutindhira kukurutu: No izwi rendakazwa rayinga rakadari ngo ro variji, vechirija zvidyangari zvavo.

Navo vanoimba inonga nduyo ipsha pamberi po dendemaro no pamberi po zvisikwa zvirongomuna zvinopona, no pamberi po vakuru. Apana mundhu waikona kujija nduyo iyo kwega avo vari zana no makumi marongomuna no marongomuna wo zviuru (144.000), vakatengwa mu nyika.
Ava ndivo vasikazivi kujisvipisa ngo vanakaji, ngokuti vakadari ngo mbhandwe. Ndivo vanotevera Bvuta kwese kwo rinoenda. Vakatengwa pakati po vandhu kuti vayite mitanguro kuna Mwari no ku Bvuta.
No mumiromo yavo amuzivi kuvoneka kunyepa. Avana ndava pamberi po dendemaro ra Mwari.

Neni ndakavona ngirosi imweni yechimburuka pakati po denga, ino vhangeri ro mbhera narini, kuchumayira kwavari vanogara mu nyika, no ku majinja ese, no marusinga ese, no kundimi jese, no ku vandhu vese.
Yechiti ngo izwi guru: “Mutyenyi Mwari, mumukuje, ngokuti mukuvo wo kutonga kwake waguma; mumudire uwo wakayita denga, no nyika, no jombe, no zvinyuka zvo kumwa.”
No imweni ngirosi yochipiri yakatevera, yechiti: “Rawa, rawa, Bhabhurona guru, rakaita kuti majinja ese amwe vhini ro ushungu hwo kuomba kwaro.”
No ngirosi yechitatu yakajitevera, yechiti ngo izwi guru: “Kuti aripo mundhu unodira chikara no muezaniso wacho, no kuashira chivoniso pa huma yake, nokuti pa nyara yake,
iye unozomwa vhini ro ushungu hwa Mwari, rinonasirihwa risikazivi kuvhenganijwa mutsani yo ushungu hwake; naye unozotambujwa ngo muriro no sorufa pamberi po ngirosi jakachena no pamberi po Bvuta.”
No usi wo kutambujwa kwavo unozopwititika mbhera narini, navo avana kuzorora masikati no usiku vanodira chikara no muezaniso wacho, no uwo unoashira chivoniso cho zina racho.
Pano ndipo pano kusengerera kwo vakacheneswa, vanongwarira mipango no kugonda kuna Jesu.

Ndakazwa izwi rechibva mugore, rechiti: “Tara: Vanomuchena vakafa, vanofira kuna Mambo, kubvira zvinopano.” Eya unonanga Mweya, kuti: “Vazorore kubva kumishando yavo, ngokuti mishando yavo inovatevera.”
Ndakaringira, ndikavona gore rakachena no panyezuru po gore ndakavona umwe wakadari ngo Mwana wo Mundhu, echigara apo, ano junguja ro mukore pa musoro wake, no munyara mwake ano sikeyo inopinja.

No ngirosi imweni yakabuda, muthemperi yechidanijira ngo izwi guru kwaari wakagara panyezuru po gore, yechiti: “Tuma sikeyo yako, ucheke, ngokuti mukuvo wo kucheka waguma; ngokuti zvokukotora zvo nyika zvayibva.”
No uwo wakagara panyezuru po gore wakakandira sikeyo yake no nyika, yakakotohwa.
No ngirosi imweni yakabuda muthemperi riri mugore, nayo yayiva no sikeyo inopinja.

No imweni ngirosi yakabuda kubva paaltari, ino simba panyezuru po muriro; yakadanijira ngo izwi guru kuno iyo ina sikeyo inopinja, yechiti: “Tuma sikeyo yako inopinja, uunganije zvikore zvo mivhini yo nyika; ngokuti mavhini ayo aibva aembho.”
Ngirosi yakakandira sikeyo yayo mu nyika, ikaunganija mavhini onyika, ikaakandira muchisviniro cho vhini, cho ushungu hwa Mwari.
No chisviniro cho vhini chakatsikwatsikwa kunja kwo dhoropa, kwakabuda ngazi kubva muchisviniro cho vhini, ikagumira kumatomu omahachi, no kureba kwayo kwayita makiromitha mazana matatu (300).
Ndakavona chivoniso chimweni mugore, chikuru chinoshamisa, ngirosi nomwe jino mumatambujiko manomwe, ayiva okugumisira, ngokuti ngaaya hunozoperera ushungu hwa Mwari.
Ndakavona kudari ngo jombe ro girazi, rakavhenganijwa no muriro; navo vakanyisa chikara no muezaniso wacho no chiverengo cho zina racho, vaiyima phedo po jombe ro girazi, vano zvidyangari zva Mwari.

Vaiyimba nduyo ya Mosi, muranda wa Mwari, nduyo yo Bvuta, vechiti: “A Mambo Mwari, Unosimbarese, mishando yenyu mikuru, no inoshamisa; no njira jenyu jiri jakarurama, jino gwinyiso, iwewe Mambo wo majinja.
Ndiyani usikazokutyi, no kukuja zina rako? A Mambo, ngokuti iwewe wega wakachena; ngokuti zviito zvako zvakarurama zvakapangijihwa.”
Ngosure kwo izvi ndakavona themperi ro tende ro uchapupu hwakabewuhwa mugore.
No ngirosi nomwe ijo jayiva no matambujiko manomwe jakabuda mu themperi, jakasimira machira akachena, anon'anikira, jakasunga pamaditi ajo ngo mabhande omukore.
No chimwe cho zvisikwa zvirongomuna zvinopona chakapa ngirosi nomwe mikheyo minomwe yo mukore yakazara ngo ushungu hwa Mwari, unopona mbhera narini.
No themperi rakazara ngo usi wayibva muuthende hwa Mwari no musimba rake, akuna waikona kunghwina muthemperi mbhera matambujiko manomwe o ngirosi nomwe ayinga apera.
Neni ndakazwa izwi guru rechibva muthemperi rechiti, kuno ngirosi nomwe: “Endanyi mwodururira mikheyo minomwe yo ushungu hwa Mwari mu nyika.”
No yokutanga yakaenda, ikadurura mukheyo wayo mu nyika; kwakavapo mavonje akashata naanohwaja panyezuru po vandhu vayiva no chivoniso chechikara, vakadira muezaniso wacho.
No yochipiri yakadururira mukheyo mujombe; rakaita ngazi inonga yo mundhu wakafa; no zviro zvese zvayiva mujombe zvakafa.
No yochitatu yakadururira mukheyo wayo mumurambo no zvinyuka zvo kumwa, nazvo zvakaita ngazi.
Ndakazwa ngirosi yo mukumwa, yechiti: “Wakarurama, iwewe uripo no waindovapo, iwewe Wakachena, ngokuti wakatonga kudaro.
Ngokuti vakaparaja ngazi yo vakacheneswa no yo vaprofeti, wakavapa ngazi kuti vamwe; ngokuti vanosisihwa ndizvo.”
Ndakazwa izwi rechibva paaltari rechiti: “Eya, A Mwari Unosimbarese, zvitongero zvako zvino gwinyiso no kururama.”
No yo chirongomuna yakadururira mukheyo wayo panyezuru po zuva; rakapuwa simba ro kupisa vandhu ngo muriro.
No vandhu vakapiswa ngo kupisa kukurutu: Vakatuka zina ra Mwari uno simba panyezuru po aya matambujiko. Avazivi kutenderuka kuti vamukuje.
No yochishanu yakadururira mukheyo wayo panyezuru po dendemaro rechikara; no umambo hwacho hwakasvipiswa, vakachenga marurimi avo ngo ndava yo kuhwajihwa kwavo.
Vakatuka Mwari wo mugore ngo ndava yo kuhwajihwa kwavo, no mavonje avo; avazivi kutenderuka kubva kumishando yavo.
No yochitandhatu yakadururira mukheyo wayo panyezuru po murambo mukuru, Ufrati: No kumwa yawo yakapwa, kuti njira inasirihwe yo majimambo aibva kumabvazuva
Ndakavona mweya mitatu yakasvipiswa yakadari ngo machehe, yechibuda mumiromo wo dragoni no wo chikara, no wo muprofeti wo kunyepa.
Ngokuti ndiyo mweya yo mabzoka inoita mivoniso, inobuda kuenda kumajimambo onyika jese, kuaunganija pamwepo kuenda ku imbi yo zuva guru ra Mwari Unosimbarese.
Vonayi, ndinoviya kudari ngo mbavha, unomuchena unorinda no kungwarira zvo kusimira zvake, kuti asazofamba ari mitu, no vandhu vavone kupsheruka kwake.
Nayo yakavaunganija pamwepo kundau inozwi ngo chihebheru, Hamagedhoni.
No yochinomwe yakadururira mukheyo wayo mumweya; kwakabuda izwi guru muthemperi, rechibva kudendemaro, rechiti, zvapera.

Kwakavapo kurazva kwo mbheni, no mazwi no kutindhira, kwakavapozve kuzungunyika kukurutu kwo nyika, kusikazivi kumbovapozve kwakadaro kubvira pakusikwa kwo vandhu panyika, no kuzungunyika kwakakura kwo nyika kwakadari.
No dhoropa guru rakaguhwa kuyita marupande matatu, no madhoropa ovomajinja akawa: No Bhabhurona guru rakacherechejwa pamberi pa Mwari, kuti ripuwe tsani yo vhini rokutyisa kwo ushungu hwake.
No zvirundu zvese zvakatiza, no matundhu aazivi kuvonekazve.

No matarara makuru akabva mugore akawira panyezuru po vandhu no kurema kwao inga kwakadari ngo tarenta, no vandhu vakatuka Mwari ngo ndava yo dambujiko ro matarara; ngokuti dambujiko rao inga rakakura kakurutu.
Yakaviya imwe yo ngirosi nomwe jayiva no mikheyo minomwe, ikavereketa neni, yechiti: “Viya pano, ndinozokupangijira kutongwa kwo hure huru inogara pakumwa zhinji.”
Yovakaomba nayo majimambo onyika, no vanogara mu nyika vakarejera ngo vhini ro kuomba kwayo.
Nayo yakanditora kuenda neni mubani mu mweya, ndakavona mwanakaji wakagara panyezuru po chikara chakapshuka, chakazara ngo mazina okutuka, china musoro minomwe no nyanga jiri gumi.

No mwanakaji wakasimira zvakapshukuruka no zvakapshuka, no kunemeswa ngo mukore no mapuwe ano mutengo mukuru, no usanga, munyara mwake mwayiva no shani yo mukore yakazara ngo zvinonyangaja, zvina svina yo kuhura kwake.
No pa huma pake pakatahwa zina, rokuti: CHAKAFISHIKA, BHABHURONA GURU, MAI WO MAHURE NO ZVINONYANGAJA ZVO NYIKA.
Neni ndakavona mwanakaji arejera ngo ngazi yo vakacheneswa, yo zvapupu zva Jesu. Naapo ndakamuvona, ndakashama ngo kushamiswa kukurutu.
No ngirosi yakati kwendiri: Washamiswa ngenyi? Ndinozokubvunja chakafishika cho mwanakaji, no chochikara, chinomutwara, chino musoro munomwe no nyanga jiri gumi.

Chikara chowavona chayivapo, apachina, choda kukwira kubva murindi rakajikisisa, no kuenda mukurashwa. Naavo vanogara mu nyika, mazina avo asikazivi kutahwa mutshamba yo kupona kubvira mukusikwa kwo nyika, vanozoshamiswa apo voovona chikara chayivapo, kuti achisipo, nokuti chichazoviya.
Ndipo pano kupinimija kuno ungwaru, musoro minomwe iri matundhu manomwe, anogahwa ngo mwanakaji:
Aripo majimambo manomwe; mashanu akawa, no umwe uchiripo, no umwe uchaviya; naapo aviya kunosisira kuti agare mukuvo mudoko.
No chikara chayivapo, nazvino achisipo, chiri cho chisere, chimwe cho zvinomwe; chinoenda mukurashwa.
No nyanga jiri gumi jo wavona, jiri majimambo ari gumi asati aashira umambo; asi anoashira simba kudari ngo majimambo pamwepo no chikara nguva imwe.
Ao anomupinimijo umwe, anopa simba rao no kutonga kwao kuchikara.
Anoambana no Bvuta, no Bvuta rinozoanyisa, ngokuti uri Mambo wo majimambo no Mutongi wo vatongi, naavo vanaye vanodanijwa, no kutsananguhwa, no kugondeka.
Nayo yakati kwendiri: Kumwa yo wavona, apo panogara hure, ndivo vandhu, no zviunga, no majinja, no ndimi.
No nyanga jiri gumi jo wavona, no chikara, zvinozonyenya hure, zvinozomuparaja, kuti ave mitu, zvinozoha nyama yake, zvimupise ngo muriro.
Ngokuti Mwari wakadira izvi mumwoyo yavo kuyita kuda kwake, nokuva no mupinimijo umwe, nokupa umambo hwazvo kuno chikara, kumbhera mazwi a Mwari aitike.
No mwanakaji wo wavona uri dhoropa guru iro rinotonga panyezuru pomajimambo onyika.
Ngosure kwo izvi ndakavona ngirosi imweni yechibzuka kubva mugore, ino simba guru, no nyika yakajekiswa ngo uthende hwayo.
Yakadanijira ngo izwi rino simba, yechiti: “Rawa, rawa, Bhabhurona guru, raaugaro hwo mabzoka, no ndau yo mweya yese ino svina, no yo shiri jese jino svina, no zvinonyenyiwa.”
Ngokuti majinja ese akamwa vhini ro ushungu wo kuhura kwake, no majimambo onyika akaomba naye, no vatengesi vo nyika vakapfuma ngo simba ro uwandu hwo fuma yake.
Ndakazwa izwi rimweni, rechibva mugore, rechiti: “Budanyi kwaari, vandhu vangu kuti musaiyana naye mukushaisha kwake, zve, kuti musazoashira matambujiko ake.”
Ngokuti zvishaishi zvake zvaguma no mugore, na Mwari wakacherecheja kushata kwake.
Mupei musharo kudari ngo zvaakamupa imwimwi, muhwirijire kaviri kwakapetwa kudari ngo mushando yake mushani iyo yaakazaja, mumuzajire kaviri.

Kudari ngo uwandu kwaakajikuja ndihwo no kupona mukujidakajisa, ngokudaro mupirenyi dambujiko no kurija mbhere, ngokuti unoti mumwoyo mwake: “Ndinogara ndiri hosi, andiri shirikaji akadi, andizovoni mbhere.”
Ndizvo matambujiko ake anozomugumira ngo zuva rimwe, kufa, no kurija mbhere, no njara, unozopiswa aembho ngo muriro; ngokuti Mambo Mwari, unomutonga, uno simba.
No majimambo onyika, akaomba naye, no kupona echijidakajisa pamwepo naye, unozochema no kumurijira mbhere, apo echizoringira usi wo kupsha kwake.
Echiyima ari kuretu ngokutya kutambujika kwake, echiti: “Ihehe, Ihehe, dhoropa guru Bhabhurona, dhoropa rakagwinya! Ngokuti ngo nguva imwe kutongwa kwako kwakugumira.”
No vatengesi vo nyika vanomuchemera no kumurijira mbhere, ngokuti apana mundhu uchazotenga mijiyo yavo;

mujiyo yavo, mukore no sirivha, no mapuwe ano mutengo mukuru, no usanga, no machira akanaka orukangaza, no akapshukuruka, no osirivha, no akapshuka; no mbewu jese jo miti yo mishizha, no mbewu jese jo mijiyo yo nyanga jo njou, no mbewu jese jo mijiyo zvakaitwa ngo miti ino mutengo mukuru, no zvithusi, no zvo utare, no mapuwe akachena.

No sinamoni, no muamomona, no mutombo wo kupisa uno gwema, no mafuta okuzora, no maka no vhini, no mafuta, no upfu wakacheta, no koroni, no n'ombe, no mabvuta; no mujiyo jo mahachi, no jo ngoro, no jo hloko, no jo mweya yo vandhu.
No michero yaiemurihwa ngo mweya wako yakabva kwouri, no zviro zvese zvainakisisa, no zvain'anikira zvakabva kwouri, no vandhu avachazozvivonizve.
Vatengesi vo izvi vakayita maguruja ndiye, vanozoyima ndhambo ngokutya dambujiko rake, vechichema no kurija mbhere.
Vechiti: Ihehe, ihehe, dhoropa guru raipfeka machira akanaka orukangaza naakapshukuruka, no akapshuka, rakanemeswa ngo mukore no mapuwe ano mutengo mukuru no usanga!

Ngokuti ngo nguva imwe upfumi hwakakura kudaro hwaparajwa. No nduna jese jo ngarava, navo vese vaihluza kuenda nokuti ngo kwapi, no vahluzi, navo vese vairarama ngo kushanda mujombe, vakayima vari ndhambo,
vakadanijira vechiringira usi wo kupsha kwake vechiti: Ngo rapi dhoropa ringaezaniswa no iri dhoropa guru?

Navo vakakandira bukuta panyezuru pomusoro yavo, vakadanijira vechichema no kurija mbhere, vechiti: Ihehe, ihehe, dhoropa guru mwovakaita maguruja vese vayiva no ngarava javo mujombe ngo zvinokosha zvake! Ngokuti ngo mukuvo mudoko wakaparajwa.
Dakaranyi ngo ndava yake, iwewe denga, nemwi vakacheneswa, nemwi vapostori, nemwi vaprofeti; ngokuti Mwari wakamutongera kutonga kwenyu.
No ngirosi ino simba yakamiruja buwe ro gwiyo rakakura, ikarikandira mujombe, yechiti: “Ngokuwa kwakakura kudaro Bhabhurona, dhoropa guru, rinozokandihwa pasi, arichazovoneki no padodoko.”

No izwi ro variji vo zvidyangari, no ro vaembi, no ro vanorija minanzi, no revariji vo mbhayapaya, arichazozwiki mukati mwako, mbewu jo mishando, pikija ngouri ajichazovapo no padodoko mukati mwako; no izwi ro kukwiya arichazozwiki no padodoko mukati mwako;

no kujeka kwo chibani akuchazojeki mukati mwako; no izwi ro mukwambo no ro murovohwa arichazozwiki mukati mwako, ngokuti vatengesi vako vayiva vazvare vo nyika, ngokuti majinja ese akachengejehwa ngo kuroya kwavo.
No mukati mwake mwakavoneka ngazi yo vaprofeti no yo vakacheneswa, no yo avo vese vayinga vakaurawa mu nyika.
Ngosure kwo izvi ndakazwa izwi guru, kudari ngo ro vandhu vazhinji mugore, rechiti: “Haleluya; ruponeso, no uthende, no simba, ngo zva Mwari wedu,
ngokuti zvitongero zvake zvino gwinyiso, zvakarurama; ngokuti iye wakatonga hure huru yakashaishira nyika ngo kuhura kwayo, naye wakahwirijira ngazi yo varanda vake munyara mwake.”
Ngo kwo chipiri vanoti: “Haleluya!”, no usi wake unopwititika mbhera narini.
No vakuru vari makumi maviri no varongomuna, no zvisikwa zvirongomuna zvinopona, vakawa pasi, vakadira Mwari unogara padendemaro, vechiti, “Ameni; Haleluya!”
No izwi rakabuda mudendemaro, rechiti: Kujanyi Mwari wedu, imwimwi mwese varanda vake, nemwi munomutya, vadoko no vakuru.
Naapo ndakazwa kunonga izwi ro chiunga chakakura chinonga bope ro kumwa yakawanda, rinonga izwi ro mutindhiro uno simba, rechiti: “Haleluya!” Ngokuti Mambo Mwari wedu, Unosimbarese unotonga.
Ngatidakare no kupfara kukurutu, ngatimupe mbiri, ngokuti muchadho wo Bvuta waguma no mukaji waro wakajinasirira.
Wakatendehwa kuti ajisimije ngo machira akanaka, orukangaza, anojeka no akachena; ngokuti machira akanaka orukangaza ndizvo zviyito zvakarurama zvo vakacheneswa.
Nayo yakati kwendiri: Tara, vanomuchena vakakokwa kuha kwo madeikoni kwo muchadho wo Bvuta. Nayo yakati kwendiri: “Aya mazwi ndiwo ogwinyiso a Mwari.”

Ndakawa pasi potsoka jayo kudira. Yakati kwendiri: “Ngwara kuti usaita kudaro; ngokuti ndiri muranda pamwepo newe, no hama jako, jinobata uchapupu hwa Jesu: Dira Mwari. Uchapupu hwa Jesu uri mweya wo kuprofeta.”
Ndakavona denga rakabewuka; vona, hachi rakachena, no uwo waigada waizwi Unogondeka, Uno Gwinyiso; naye mukururama unotonga no kuambana.
No majiso ake ari murazvu wo muriro, no panyezuru po musoro wake pana majunguja akawanda. Wayiva no zina rakatahwa, risikazivikanwi ngo vandhu, asi iye ega.
Naye wakasimira nguvo yakafafazwa ngo ngazi. No zina rake rinozwi: Izwi ra Mwari.
No hondo jiri mugore jakamutevera jechigada mahachi akachena jakasimira machira akanaka orukangaza akachena no kusukika.
No shoti inopinja inobuda mumuromo wake, kuti arove ndiyo majinja: Naye unozoatonga ngo ndonga yo utare, inotsikatsika chikamuriro cho vhini ro kutyisa kwo ushungu hwa Mwari Unesimbarese.
Naye uno zina rakatahwa panyezuru po nguvo yake, no po mutezo yake, kuti: MAMBO WO MAJIMAMBO NO MUTONGI WO VATONGI.
Ndakavona ngirosi yechiyima pazuva; yakadanijira ngo izwi guru, yechiti kune shiri jese jinomburuka mugore. Viyanyi muungane padhiri guru ra Mwari;
kuti muhe nyama yo majimambo, no nyama yo nduna, no yo vandhu vano simba, no yo mahachi, no yo avo vanoagadha, no nyama yo vandhu vese, vakasununguka no vakasungwa, no yo vadoko no vakuru.
Ndakavona chikara, no majimambo onyika, no hondo jao, jakaungana pamwepo kuti jiambane no uwo wakagadha hachi, no hondo yakezve.

No chikara chakabatwa, no muprofeti wo kunyepa uwo wakashanda zvivoniso mukuvona kwacho, zvaakachengejera ndizvo avo vayinga vaashira chivoniso cho chikara, naavo vakadira muezaniso wacho: Ava vaviri vakakandihwa vapenye mugandwa ro muriro raibwaka ngo sorufa:
No vamweni vakaurawa ngo shoti yo uwo waigadha hachi, ngo shoti yakabuda mumiromo wake; no shiri jese jakaguta ngo nyama yavo.
Neni ndakavona ngirosi yechibzuka kubva mugore, ino mugogo wo rindi rakajikisisa no garagajero guru munyara yayo.
Yakabata dragoni, nyoka yokare, iri Dhiabhorosi, na Dhiaborosi, ikamusunga chiuru (1.000) cho makore.

Yakamukandira murindi rakajikisisa, ikarikonya, ikadira chinamiro panyezuru pake, kuti asazochengejerazve majinja, kumbhera chiuru cho makore (1.000) apera. Ngosure kwo izvi kunosisira kuti ambosununguhwa mukuvo mudoko.

Ndakavona madendemaro, naavo vakagara panyezuru pao, no kutonga kwakapuwa kwavari; ndakavona mwoyo yo avo vakaguhwa musoro ngo ndava yo uchapupu hwa Jesu, na ngo ndava yo izwi ra Mwari, naavozve vasikazivi kudira chikara, nokuti muezaniso wacho, vasikazivi kuashira chivoniso pa huma javo no panyara pavo; navo vakararama, vechitonga na Kristu kupeja chiuru (1.000) cho makore.
Vamweni vakafa avazivi kurarama mbhera makore ari chiuru (1.000) apera. Ukwu ndikwo kumuka kwo kutanga.

Unodakajiswa no kucheneswa uno chikovaniswa mukumuka kwo kutanga. Panyezuru po ava kufa kwo chipiri akuna simba; asi vanozoita vapristi va Mwari no va Kristu, vanozotonga naye chiuru (1.000) cho makore.
Naapo chiuru (1.000) cho makore chapera, Sathani unozosununguhwa kubva muguniya rake.
Unozoenda kwoochengejera majinja ari kumarupande marongomuna onyika, ari Gogi na Magogi, kuaunganijira kurwa: Uwandu wavo hwakadari ngo musanga wo jombe.
Vakakwira po kupambhama kwo nyika, vakatendeneja muchacha wo vakacheneswa, no dhoropa rinodikana: Kwakabzuka muriro wechibva mugore, ukavapeja.
Na Dhiabhorosi uwo wakavachengejera, wakakandihwa mugandwa ro muriro no sorufa, muno chikara no muprofeti wo kunyepa; navo vanozotambujwa masikati no usiku mbhera narini.
Ndakavona dendemaro guru rakachena, no uwo wakagara panyezuru paro, uwo nyika no denga zvakamutiza, azvivi kuzovonekazve no ndau yazvo.

Ndakavona vakafa vakuru no vadoko, vakayima pamberi po dendemaro, no mabhuku akabewuhwa; no rimweni bhuku rakabewuhwa, riri bhuku ro kupona; no vakafa vakatongwa ngo izvo zvakatahwa mumabhuku, kudari ngo mishando yavo.
No jombe rakabudisa vakafa vayiva mukati mwaro, no rufu no Haidhesi zvakabudisa vakafa vayiva mukati mwazvo, navo vakatongwa umwe ngaumwe kudari ngo mushando yake.
No rufu no Haidhesi zvakakandihwa mugandwa ro muriro. Ukwu ndikwo kufa kwo chipiri, gandhwa ro muriro.
Kuti mundhu wakawanika asikazivi kutahwa mubhuku ro kupona, wakakandihwa mugandwa ro muriro.
Neni ndakavona denga ibza no nyika ipsha. Ngokuti denga rokutanga no nyika yokutanga zvakapinda, jombe inga kusina.
Ndakavona dhoropa rakachena, Jerusarema ibza rechibzuka mugore, rechibva kuna Mwari, rakanasirihwa kudari ngo murovohwa wakanemesehwa mwamuna wake.
Ndakazwa izwi guru rechibva kudendemaro, rechiti: “Vona, tende ra Mwari riri pakati po vandhu naye unozogara navo, navo vanozoita vandhu vake, na Mwari pachake unozova navo, echiita Mwari wavo.”
Naye unozopukuta musoji yese kumajiso avo, no kufa akuchazovapo, nokuti chiriro, nokuti kuchema, zve, akuchazovapo kuhwajihwa, ngokuti zviro zvokutanga zvapinda.
No uwo wakagara padendemaro wakati: “Vonanyi ndinoita zviro zvese kuti zviite zvipsha.” Naye wakati: Tara, ngokuti aya mazwi anogondeka, ano gwinyiso.
Naye wakati kwendiri: “Zvaitika, ndiri Arifa na Omega, wokutanga no wokugumisira.” Ndinozopa kwaari unozwa nyota kumwa yo mwimbo yo kupona ngo nyasha.
Iye unonyisa unozogara ndhaka yo zviro zvese, ndinozoita Mwari wake, naye unozoita mwana wangu.

Asi vanotya, no vasikatendi, no vanonyangaja, no vaurayi, no vanoomba, no varoyi no vadiri vo muezaniso, navo vese vanyepi vanozova no chikovaniswa chavo mugandwa rinobwaka ngo muriro no sorufa, ndiko kufa kwochipiri.
Yakaviya imwe yo ngirosi nomwe yo ijo jayiva no mikheyo minomwe ino matambujiko manomwe okugumisira; yakavereketa neni, yechiti: “Viya pano, ndinozokupangijira murovohwa, mukaji wo Bvuta.”
Yakanditora mu Mweya kuenda ku dundhu guru rakareba, ikandipangijira dhoropa rakachena Jerusarema, rechibzuka mugore rechibva kuna Mwari.
Rino uthende hwa Mwari: Kujeka kwaro kwayinga kwakadari ngo buwe rino mutengo mukuru aembho, rinonga buwe ro jasipa, rakaera kudari ngo rinokhazikira.
Rino biravira guru rakareba; rino misuvo iri gumi na muviri, no pa musuvo pano ngirosi jiri gumi na mbiri; no mazina akatahwa panyezuru pajo, ari mazina ovana vari gumi na vaviri va Israeri.
Kumabvazuva kwayivapo misuvo mitatu; na ngo kanjikazi kwayivapo misuvo mitatu; na ngo kakusi kwayivapo misuvo mitatu na ngo kumavirira kwayivapo misuvo mitatu.
No kubiravira ro dhoropa rayiva no majiro ari gumi na maviri, no pa nyezuru pao payiva no mazina ari gumi na maviri ovapostori vari gumi na vaviri vo Bvuta.
Iyo yakavereketa neni yayiva no njanga yo mukore, kupima dhoropa, no misuvo yaro, no biravira raro.

No dhoropa rayiva no makhona marongomuna akaezana, no kureba kwaro kwakandodari ngo kupambhama kwaro: Yakapima dhoropa ngo njanga, rayiva masitadiyo zviuru gumi na zviviri (12.000): Kureba kwaro, no kupambhama, no ukwiri hwaro, hwayiva hwakaezana.
Nayo yakapima mapiravira aro, rayiva makumbiti ari zana no makumi marongomuna na marongomuna (144), kudari ngo kupima kwo mundhu, kunoti, kwo ngirosi.
No mapiravira aro akavakiwa ngo jasipa, dhoropa rayiva ro mukore wakaera, wakadari ngo girazi rakaera.

Majiro omapiravira wo dhoropa akanemeswa ngo mbewu jese jo mapuwe ano mutengo mukuru. Jiro rokutanga rayiva ro jasipa; no rochipiri rayiva sapifiro; rochitatu rayiva ro karikedhoni; no rochirongomuna rayiva ro simaragidho,

rochishanu rayiva ro saradonuki; no rochitandhatu rayiva ro saradhiyo; no ro chinomwe rayiva ro krusoriti; no ro chisere rayiva ro bheruri, no rochipfumbamwe rayiva ro topazi; ro chigumi rayiva ro krusoprasi rochigumi na rimwe hwakinte; no rochigumi na maviri rayiva ro ametusito.
No misuvo iri gumi na muviri yayiva yo usanga iri gumi na muviri; umwe ngaumwe wo misuvo wayiva wo usanga umwe: No gwanja ro dhoropa rayiva ro mukore wakaera, unonga girazi rakaera.
Neni andizivi kuvona themperi mukati mwaro, ngokuti Mambo Mwari Unosimbarese, no Bvuta vari themperi yaro.
No dhoropa aritami zuva, nokuti mweji kurijekisa, ngokuti uthende hwa Mwari wakarijekisa, no Bvuta riri chibani charo.
No majinja anozofamba ngo kujeka kwaro: No majimambo onyika anozozisa uthende hwao mukati mwaro.
No misuvo yaro aizokonyiwi masikati, ngokuti ahuzovapo usiku:
Navo vanozozisa uthende no kureremejwa kwo majinja mukati mwaro.
Asi akuna nachimwe chakasvipiswa chinozonghwinemwo nokuti uwo unoyita chinonyangaja no manyepo: Asi avo vega vakatahwa mubhuku ro kupona ro Bvuta.
Apo yakandipangijira murambo wakaera wo kumwa yo kupona, wakaera kudari ngo girazi, wechibuda mudendemaro ra Mwari no ro Bvuta.

Pakati po gwanja raro, no kumarutivi ese omurambo, kwayivapo muti wo kupona, wo chibereka mbewu jiri gumi na mbiri jo michero, wechibereka michero yawo mweji yese: No masakani omuti ayiva okurapa majinja.
Akusazovapozve chinonyangaja: No dendemaro ra Mwari no ro Bvuta anozovapo mukati mwaro, no varanda vake vanozomushandira;
vanozovona hope yake, no zina rake rinovapo pa huma javo.
Akuchazovapo usiku; navo avazotami kujeka kwo chibani, nokuti kujeka kwo zuva, ngokuti Mambo Mwari unozovapa kujeka: Vanozotonga mbhera narini.
Nayo yakati kwendiri: Aya mazwi anogondeka, ano gwinyiso na Mambo Mwari wo mweya yo vaprofeti wakatuma ngirosi yake kuti ipangijire varanda vake zvinosisira kuti zvikasire kuitika:
“Vona, ndinokasira kuviya, Unomuchena uwo unongwarira mazwi okuprofeta kwo iri bhuku.”
Inini Johani ndakazwa ndikavona izvi. Naapo ndazwa no kuvona, ndakawa pasi kudira pamberi po tshoka jo ngirosi yakandipangijira izvi.
Nayo yakati kwendiri: “Ngwara kuti usaita kudaro: Ndiri muranda pamwepo newe, no wo hama jako vaprofeti, no wo avo vanongwarira mazwi okuprofeta kwo bhuku iri; dira Mwari.”
Yakatizve kwendiri: “Usakonya mazwi okuprofeta kwo bhuku iri; ngokuti mukuvo waaphedo.
Iye usikazivi kururama ngaagare asikazivi kururama; no uwo uno svina ngaagare ano svina; no uwo wakarurama ngaagare wakarurama; no uwo wakacheneswa ngaagare wakacheneswa.
Vona, ndinokasira kuviya, no musharo wangu uneni, kuti ndipe mundhu wese kudari ngo mushando wake.
Ndiri Arifa na Omega, wokutanga no wokugumisira, muambi no mupejisiri.
Vanomuchena avo vanosuka nguvo javo, kuti vakone kuviya kumuti wo kupona, no kunghwina ngo pamisuvo mu dhoropa.
Ngokuti ngo kunja kuno imbhwa, no vanoroya, no vanoomba, no vaurayi, no vadira muezaniso, navo vese vanodira no kuyita kunyepa.
Inini Jesu ndakatuma ngirosi yangu kupupura izvi kwomuri mu zviara. Ndiri miji, no ruji rwa Dhavhidha, ndhondo inojeka masase.”
No Mweya no murovohwa vanoti: “Viya!” No uwo unozwa ngaati: “Viya!” Naye unozwa nyota, ngaaviye: Uwo unoda ngaatore kumwa yo kupona ngo nyasha.
Ngokuti ndinopupura ku mundhu wese unozwa mazwi okuprofeta kwo bhuku iri. Kuti uripo mundhu unozonyengejera kuzviro izvi, Mwari unozonyengejera kwaari matambujiko akatahwa mubhuku iri:
Nokuti aripo mundhu unozopungura mazwi obhuku ro kuprofeta uku, Mwari unozobvisa chikovehwa chake kumuti wo kupona, no kudhoropa rakachena, izvo zvakatahwa mubhuku iri.
Iye unopupura izvi unoti: “Eya ndinokasira kuviya.” Ameni, viya Mambo Jesu.
Nyasha ja Mambo Jesu ngajive nemwi mwese.
